item.title: Getting started with outlook-addin
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting outlook-addin set up or installed. Create first outlook-addin - Hello World # Open Visual Studio Select File –> New –> Project menu or push Ctrl + Shift + N buttons Select Outlook VSTO Add-in template Add the following code to the project: private void ThisAddIn_Startup(object sender, System.EventArgs e) { MessageBox.Show(“Hello world”); } Run the program
